meanings.definition: A marked path for pedestrians to cross a street.
meanings.sent1: The crosswalk is where people can safely walk across the road.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to use the crosswalk when crossing the street.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken use the crosswalk? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: The crosswalk is like a bridge for pedestrians to cross the busy street.
meanings.sent5: The bright stripes of the crosswalk make it easy to spot from far away.

meanings.definition: To walk across a street at a designated crossing.
meanings.sent1: I will crosswalk at the traffic light when it turns green.
meanings.sent2: Remember to crosswalk only when the signal indicates it's safe.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to crosswalk right in front of the oncoming car!
meanings.sent4: She had to crosswalk through the bustling city streets to reach her destination.
meanings.sent5: Crosswalking during rush hour can be quite challenging with all the traffic.
